raw_comment: I noticed that it is a graph showing us the difference between how much people reach out to each other and how they do it. I also noticed how young women are more likely to reach out to others rather than young men. I wonder why is it that people do not reach out with a phone call than texts. This relates to my community because I reach out to my parents at least 3-5 times a day and the community usually does too even if it is on the phone or just a text.
ace_sentences: The graph shows a difference between how much people reach out to each other and how people reach out to each other.
I noticed that young women are more likely to reach out to other people than young men.
I wonder why people do not reach out with a phone call more than with texts.
I reach out to my parents at least 3 times a day.
I reach out to my parents at most 5 times a day.
People in my community usually reach out to other people.
People in my community reach out by phone call or by text.
